card.name: Spirit's Advocate
card.text: Paradox — Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

card.name: Maverick Medicalist
card.text: When this creature enters, target opponent reveals their hand. You may exile a nonland card from it. If you do, exile this creature.

card.name: Servant of Ravens
card.text: Gift a card (You may promise an opponent a gift as you cast this spell. If you do, when it enters, they draw a card.) Flying When this creature enters, if the gift was promised, target opponent sacrifices a creature.

card.name: Bad Influence
card.text: Deathtouch When this creature enters, destroy up to one target green or white creature.

card.name: Father of Ransoms
card.text: When this creature enters, choose target permanent an opponent controls. They may sacrifice it. If they don't, create a 3/2 black Horror creature token with menace.

card.name: Sweet Sorrow
card.text: Destroy target creature with no counters on it.

card.name: Initiation Into Fear
card.text: When this enchantment enters, put a +1/+1 counter and a menace counter on up to one target creature. Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, you may remove a counter from one of them. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Joyful Conflagration
card.text: Gift a card. (You may promise an opponent a gift as you cast this spell. If you do, they draw a card before its other effects.) Joyful Conflagration deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If the gift was promised, it deals 5 damage to that permanent instead.

Creatures you control with thirst counters on them get +3/+3 and have lifelink and "{B}, Pay 2 life: Draw a card."

card.name: Ralk, the Avid Word
card.text: When Ralk enters, veil the top card of your library with a rage counter on it. (Put it onto the battlefield face-down as a 2/2 creature. You may cast it while it's attacking. If it's a creature, it enters tapped and attacking and keeps counters and blockers.) Creatures you control with rage counters on them get +2/+2 and have haste and "Other creatures you control have haste."

card.name: Ejo, the Ripening Word
card.text: When Ejo enters, veil the top card of your library with a vim counter on it. (Put it onto the battlefield face-down as a 2/2 creature. You may cast it while it's attacking. If it's a creature, it enters tapped and attacking and keeps counters and blockers.) Creatures you control with vim counters on them get +3/+3 and have trample and "Lands you control have ‘{T}: Add {G}{G}.'"

card.name: Lucent Playwright
card.text: When Lucent Playwright enters, if your starting library contained at least thirty more cards than the minimum deck size. search your library for a card and veil it, then shuffle. (Put it onto the battlefield face-down as a 2/2 creature. You may cast it while it's attacking. If it's a creature, it enters tapped and attacking and keeps counters and blockers.)

card.name: All-Consuming Project
card.text: During your turn, you can't cast spells from your hand. {1}, {T}: Draw a card.

card.name: Prima Donna
card.text: This creature can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or greater. Whenever you attack with exactly two creatures, target opponent may exile a nonland card from their hand. If they do, they may play that card for as long as it remains exiled. Each spell cast this way costs {1} more to cast. If they don't, draw a card.

card.name: Radical Experiment
card.text: Target creature's owner shuffles it into their library, then exiles cards from the top of their library until they exile a nonland card. They may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Draw a card.

card.name: Celebrated Violist
card.text: When this creature enters, create The Second Fiddle, a legendary artifact token with "{1}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery." Whenever another creature you control dies, mill cards equal to the number of counters on it. Return a creature card milled this way to your hand.

card.name: Nia, Yesterday's Beloved
card.text: Paradox — Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, create a Treasure token, then exile the top card of each player's library. Once during each of your turns, you may play a card exiled with Nia.

card.name: Cursed Portrait
card.text: Whenever a creature or planeswalker you control dies, you may exile it. {T}, Put a card exiled with this artifact into its owner's graveyard: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains all triggered and activated abilities of that card until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: The Sound of Chimes
card.text: Flying When this creature enters, exile all but the bottom nine cards of target opponent's library. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may cast an exiled nonland card an opponent owns without paying its mana cost.

card.name: The Second Fiddle BLV BLV
card.text: {1}, {T},: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Generous Reveler
card.text: Trample When this creature enters, you may have target opponent gain control of another target permanent you control. If you do, draw a card and put X +1/+1 counters on this creature, where X is that permanent's mana value.

card.name: Physician of Abominations
card.text: Whenever a Horror you control dies, create a token that's a copy of it, except it's not a Horror. {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Draw a card. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Patron of the Nameless
card.text: This creature has no name. (The legend rule doesn't apply to this creature.) Whenever this creature or another creature you control with no name enters, draw a card, then put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control with no name.

card.name: Revisionist Historian
card.text: Creature cards in your hand have vision {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}. (You may cast them as though they had flash for {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}. Exile them when they enter. You may cast them from exile on a later turn.)

card.name: Unspoken Rule
card.text: When this enchantment enters, draw a card, then look at the top seven cards of target opponent's library. Exile one of them face-down. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order. {1}, Sacrifice this enchantment, Reveal the exiled card: Counter target spell with the same name as the exiled card.
